CREATE TABLE application.story_tasks( story_id bigserial NOT NULL, task_id bigserial NOT NULL, priority numeric NULL,
CONSTRAINT story_tasks_pk PRIMARY KEY (story_id, task_id), CONSTRAINT st_story_fk FOREIGN KEY (story_id) REFERENCES application.story (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT st_task_fk2 FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES application.task (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
